title: BRIEF-Cochin Shipyard Signs Contract With Kochi Metro Rail For 1.76 Bln Rupees
text:
BRIEF-Cochin Shipyard Signs Contract With Kochi Metro Rail For 1.76 Bln Rupees

Stock Markets 29 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 11:06)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cochin Shipyard Signs Contract With Kochi Metro Rail For 1.76 Bln Rupees Oct 30 (Reuters) - Cochin Shipyard Ltd : * COCHIN SHIPYARD - SIGNED CONTRACT WITH KOCHI METRO RAIL FOR DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION OF 23 HYBRID-ELECTRIC PASSENGER FERRIES * ORDER VALUE AT 1.76 BILLION RUPEES

BRIEF-Cochin Shipyard Signs Contract With Kochi Metro Rail For 1.76 Bln Rupees
